Package gov.nasa.pds.harvest.search.crawler

Class PDSProductCrawler

java.lang.Object
gov.nasa.pds.harvest.search.oodt.crawler.ProductCrawlerBean
gov.nasa.pds.harvest.search.oodt.crawler.ProductCrawler
gov.nasa.pds.harvest.search.crawler.PDSProductCrawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PDSCoreMetKeys
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectionCrawler
public class PDSProductCrawler extends ProductCrawler
Class that extends the Cas-Crawler to crawl a directory or PDS inventory file and register products to the PDS Registry Service.
Author:
mcayanan
